page.title: 05Industry
page.content: There are a number of industrial sites in Cwmfelinfach which have brought some jobs to local people.On the main road double glazing firm Burles Window and in the Institute are Sports Fix and Pink House Electronics.The largest area is the Nine Mile Point Redevolop- ment site.34 factory units have been built on the reclaimed colliery site for manufacturing and storage.About 30% of the units have not been used but with the nearness of the M4 and a new Risca bypass its importance as an industrial location should grow. Although some units are used as ware houses,some local women work in industries making Christmas trees, sterile hospital equipment,precision instruments for aircraft and industry, extrusion of plastic products,steel hardening specialists and the manufacture of wooden products.
